question: This airport becomes 24x7 functional with CAT IIIB landing system technology.
option1: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose International Airport
answer: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose International Airport
explanation: Kolkata's Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose International Airport has become the 5th airport in India having CAT III B landing system runway 01R. It enables flights to land even when visibility is 50 metres with decision height of 15 meters.
